articles.author: Aurora Bosotti
articles.title: Prince Philip humiliated as Queen ordered Duke's project be hidden to avoid backlash - Express
articles.description: PRINCE PHILIP was left humiliated after efforts to modernise the image of the Royal Family were hidden away because of the Queen's concerns about a public backlash, an Italian documentary has claimed.

articles.title: Jessica Simpson sports matching Christmas pyjamas with daughter Maxwell - Daily Mail
articles.description: The singer and actress, 40, appeared every inch the doting mom as she donned matching Christmas pyjamas with her eldest daughter Maxwell, eight.
